Articles.Content: Patcher won't start, and the website = 500 error giver.

In the meantime, you can start KSP by directly using the executable. It should be in your KSP directory, wherever that is. (By default it installs to C:\\Kerbal Space Program on Windows boxes, sans Steam.)

Patcher won't start, and the website = 500 error giver.

I'll pass on the Patcher error. Website should be back online.
